executive_summary: The audit of the system reveals that all agents are functioning as expected with compliance to security, performance, and reliability standards. Performance metrics are within acceptable ranges, and no anomalies were detected during this audit cycle. However, there is room for improvement in optimizing resource usage and increasing audit cycle frequency.

performance_analysis.cpu_usage: The CPU usage is at 49.95%, which is within the optimal range for system operations.
performance_analysis.memory_usage: Memory usage is at 69.95%, indicating efficient utilization but nearing the upper threshold for optimal performance.
performance_analysis.api_latency: API latency is at 149.95ms, which is acceptable but could be improved to enhance user experience.
performance_analysis.throughput: Throughput is at 149.95, indicating a robust processing capability.

key_findings: All agents are operational and compliant with the required standards.
No anomalies were detected during this audit cycle.
The system has not conducted any audit cycles, which may affect long-term compliance monitoring.
recommendations: Increase the frequency of audit cycles to ensure continuous compliance monitoring.
Optimize memory usage to prevent potential performance degradation.
Consider reducing API latency to improve system responsiveness.
